arm_group.description: salbutamol at M0 and M60 placebo administration
placebo at M0 and M60 salbutamol administration

brief_summary.textblock: randomized double-blind controlled study in parallel groups

clinical_study.brief_title: Beta Agonist Nebulization in Non Invasively Ventilated COPD Patients: Safety, and Therapeutic Efficacy Range.
clinical_study.condition: Clinically Significant Increase in Maximum Expiratory Volume Per Second

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patient over 18 years old

          -  Patient with BPCO, defined:

               -  by an irreversible obstructive syndrome

               -  and\or by different arguments (histories, symptoms, physical examination,
                  thoracic radiography, gas of the blood)

          -  Decompensation of this BPCO in the form of acute respiratory failure

          -  No argument for a dominant acute left cardiac insufficiency

          -  Consent signed by the patient

          -  Patient with national health assurance

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Contraindications in the not invasive ventilation

          -  Patient not volunteer for the realization of the spirometry

          -  Precautions for use of ß2 mimetic (engrave hyperthyroidism)

          -  Under guardianship patient or protection of justice

          -  Pregnant patient

facility.name: Service de Réanimation Médicale - CHR d'Orléans

clinical_study.official_title: Controlled Randomized Double-blind Study Comparing Salbutamol and Placebo Via Aerosol in Chronic Obstructive Respiratory Insufficiency in Exacerbartion Treated With Noninvasive Ventilation

oversight_info.authority: France: Afssaps - Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (Saint-Denis)

primary_outcome.measure: Collection at the bedside spirometric values​​
primary_outcome.time_frame: gross change in forced expiratory volume in one second from the beginning of salbutamol or placebo and 15 min after the start

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: gross change in vital capacity of peak expiratory flow rate, the ratio of FEV, forced expiratory flow
secondary_outcome.time_frame: between the median baseline and 15 min after the start of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: gross change in respiratory rate, heart rate and systolic and diastolic blood pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: between baseline and 15 min after the start of treatment
between baseline and 15 min after the start of treatment
